column1: Little Goat Diner////How's the food? This may be Little Goat
column2: but it's certainly big on taste! I had the kimchee
column4: inspired by Thai street food (and other similar Asian concepts). It was definitely a tasty combination of flavors and textures
column5: given the bacon and the bean sprouts that were used. Â It comes with a little portion of sauce that you can use to add some additional flavor to your preference.
